execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue (in EUR) for this quarter from the EU sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EUR' AS currency, SUM(total_eur) AS revenue FROM orders WHERE updated_at >= date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE) AND updated_at < (date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '3 months');

execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue (in EUR) for this quarter from the US sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EUR' AS currency, SUM(total_eur) AS revenue FROM orders WHERE updated_at >= date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE) AND updated_at < (date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '3 months');
